analysis.key_quote: If this employee is in constant fear of being removed from their position, they will adopt a 'so what' attitude. 'Why bother if I can be fired not because of my performance but just because the administration wants to place a more favored, loyal person in my position?'
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses clear opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about job security, the potential for politicization, and the undermining of merit-based employment practices.
